import React from 'react'; const ComplaintStats = ({ stats }) => { return (
{/* Total Complaints */}

Total Complaints

{stats.total}

{/* Pending Complaints */}

Pending

{stats.pending}

{/* In Progress Complaints */}

In Progress

{stats.inProgress}

{/* Resolved Complaints */}

Resolved

{stats.resolved}

); }; export default ComplaintStats;
